full_summary:
Double Compartment Gas Convection Steamer Request for Tender
======================
### Overview
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a Double Compartment Gas Convection Steamer for Food Services at the Grierson Institution. 

### Details
*   Bid Closing Date: May 18th, 2023 at 2:00:00 PM EDT
*   Estimated Contract Start Date: May 19th, 2023
*   Estimated Contract End Date: May 20th, 2024
*   Service Requirement: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement for a Double Compartment Gas Convection Steamer for Food Services at Grierson Institution.
*   Trade Agreements: Tender included under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Procurement Details
The tendering process for this contract is open and competitive.

*   Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding

### Contact Information
For any inquiries related to this tender, please contact Douglas Rachinski at douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Resources
To access the full tender details, please visit the SAP Ariba platform: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16031069>

Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before the bid closing date and time to be considered responsive. Bids submitted after this date will be declared non-responsive.
